WorkItem.Description:
Just worried about the new calculations, Optimize with Talents, Regem and Enchants suggest removing Expose Weakness completely. This gives me 650AP bonus most of the time.
Also I may have reached a Crit Cap, that was not noticed in 2.27, now suggests using a haste scope on my ranged weapon, and some haste gems.
Also Blood Fury is no longer in Shot Rotation anymore.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Suggests Haste instead of Crit Gems, and losing Expose Armor

Comments.Message:
1) Don't use Optimize with Talents, it is wholly unreliable except for a couple of models.
2) Crit cap isn't being enforced yet, won't be until the new rotation setup is done
3) I already closed the issue on Blood Fury, that removal was intentional
Expose Weakness was bugged, the setup for it was in there but it was being added to the wrong variable. This is corrected and the talent now has value for next version.
